name: MathGame (dgdfurkan)
description:
This is a basic math operations game. 

  • After you create your account, you can change the background if you want.
  • You can adjust the sound of the game to the level you want.
  • You can choose according to the operations and difficulty.
  • When you have difficulties, your teacher will come to help you
  • See yourself and other players on the leaderboard.

Come on, don't wait and start competing with other people playing with you.
